pages.text: $(li)The Loyalty enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows the trident to automatically return after being thrown.
pages.title: Loyalty

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_loyalty)Ancient Tome (Loyalty)$(/l).
